title: Purge all “SentinelAI” branding and make the Assistant service healthy and fully working

requirements.text: Remove all user-facing occurrences of the “SentinelAI” name from the website UI and replace them with “Nexus Forge AI”, ensuring that no visible text, aria-labels, alt text, headings, paragraphs, helper text, or CTA copy on any section renders “SentinelAI”. At minimum, update the known remaining occurrences in: `frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/AssistantSection.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/UseCasesSection.tsx`, and `frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx`.

quotes: and everything on the page says sentinel ai no change that I want everything on the website is Nexus forge ai no sentinel ai I don't want nothing on the website that says sentinel ai no I want it Nexus forge ai

acceptanceCriteria: Visually scanning the site (all sections in `frontend/src/App.tsx`) shows zero instances of the string “SentinelAI”.
A case-insensitive search for “SentinelAI” across `frontend/src` returns no matches in user-facing content, including `alt` attributes and `aria-label` values.
The brand name displayed in the header and footer reads “Nexus Forge AI”.

requirements.text: Update branding-related static asset references so the header/footer logo images and hero background no longer reference SentinelAI-named assets (e.g., `/assets/generated/sentinelai-...`) and ensure all referenced assets load without 404s after deployment.

quotes: I don't want nothing on the website that says sentinel ai

acceptanceCriteria: No `` tags or CSS `backgroundImage` URLs in rendered pages reference filenames containing `sentinelai`.
All images referenced by the UI return HTTP 200 (no 404s) after deployment.
The site favicon and social images remain valid and render correctly.

requirements.text: Adjust Contact section copy and presentation so the website does not visually display the string “SentinelAI” anywhere, including the visible email address and auto-generated email subject/body text, while preserving the existing mailto destination behavior to the provided email address unless the user provides a replacement email.

quotes: I don't want nothing on the website that says sentinel ai

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section contains no visible “SentinelAI” text, including in success messages and helper paragraphs.
Submitting the contact form still opens the user’s email client via `mailto:` and includes a sensible subject/body that uses “Nexus Forge AI” branding.
The mailto destination remains functional and unchanged unless explicitly updated by the user.

requirements.text: Fix the Motoko Assistant backend so the service reports ready/healthy and can answer questions reliably without trapping. Specifically: ensure `healthy()` returns `true` when the assistant knowledge base is usable, seed or persist a non-empty curated knowledge base on-canister, and change `getAnswer(question)` to never `trap` (including for unknown questions) and instead return a deterministic, user-friendly English fallback answer branded as “Nexus Forge AI”.

quotes: fix the assistant service so is ready and working 100 percent all implemented it says Assistant service is not ready

acceptanceCriteria: Calling `healthy()` from the frontend health hook results in `status: healthy` under normal operation (no “Assistant service is not ready” for a properly deployed canister).
`getAnswer` does not trap for any input (empty/unknown/partial matches); it returns a safe English message for unknown questions.
The Assistant section can submit a question and receive an answer end-to-end on the deployed site without errors.
Backend logic remains within the single main actor (`backend/main.mo`); add/adjust `backend/migration.mo` only if required to preserve/upgrade existing stable state.

constraints: Do not change the demo URL behavior (keep linking to https://nexusforgeai.base44.app/Chat).
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister; keep all logic in `backend/main.mo` and only introduce `backend/migration.mo` changes if a state upgrade is necessary.
nonGoals: Adding third-party services or external databases for assistant knowledge storage.
Introducing new auth providers beyond Internet Identity.
Changing site structure/section order beyond what is required to remove “SentinelAI” text and fix assistant readiness.
Adding new marketing sections or new product features unrelated to branding removal and assistant readiness.
